description: Grants permission to upload an attachment to a case.

parameters.name: caseId
parameters.description: Required element for GetCaseAttachmentUploadUrl to identify the case ID for uploading an attachment to.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: Required element for GetCaseAttachmentUploadUrl to identify the file name of the attachment to upload.

parameters.name: contentLength
parameters.description: Required element for GetCaseAttachmentUploadUrl to identify the size od the file attachment.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: Optional element for customer provided token. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: attachmentPresignedUrl
nested_items.description: Response element providing the Amazon S3 presigned UTL to upload the attachment.
